content:
I want to define the powerset of the powerset of a set: Here's my attempt.

import Mathlib.Data.Set.Basic
import Mathlib
variable {U : Type*}
variable(F : Set U)

def powerset := {B : Set U | B ⊆ F}
--here's where things go wrong...
def pow_powerset := {B : Set U | B \ss powerset}

I see the point of :

application type mismatch
B ⊆ powerset A
argument
powerset A
has type
Set (Set U) : Type u_1
but is expected to have type
Set U : Type u_1

But how do I fix it? Thanks!
Janitha has marked this topic as resolved.
